description: City: Pittsburgh, PAThe Steer and Wheel prides itself on serving gourmet burgers to the hungry people of Pittsburgh. With a variety of proteins and toppings to choose from, you really can't go wrong with any choice on their menu. When you order from The Steer and Wheel, you can rest assured that you are eating all-natural beef with no hormones or antibiotics, and if you get a side of fries, you can feel good knowing that they weren't cooked with trans fat oils. In addition, all of their materials are compostable and/or biodegradable.
name: The Steer & Wheel
